Appetizers.name: Hearty Beef Chili
Appetizers.description: Our farm-to-table specialty chili features a low sodium beef broth with diced onion and tomato, black beans, and local grass-fed beef. Topped with optional sour cream, Vermont cheddar cheese, and chopped scallions. Served with artisan bread.

Appetizers.name: Garden Salad
Appetizers.description: Locally harvested greens, including kale, spinach, and arugala. Topped with seasonal veggies and croutons. Dressings available include: House, ranch, thousand island, oil & vinegar. Served with hot buttered bread.

Appetizers.name: Fruit Plate
Appetizers.description: Vanilla yogurt topped with local honey, walnuts, seeds, hemp hearts, chia see, and seasonal fresh fruit. Ask your server what's in rotation!

Hot Sandwiches.name: The Green Mountain Hike
Hot Sandwiches.description: Grass-fed roast beef with provolone cheese, LTO, mayo, and our house made chimichurri sauce. Comes on a heritage roll and served with chips and a pickle.

Hot Sandwiches.name: Buffalo Rancher
Hot Sandwiches.description: Spicy sweet buffalo chicken topped with cheddar cheese, tomatoes, ranch, and our house made sweet garlic aioli. Comes on an egg roll and served with chips and a pickle.

Hot Sandwiches.name: Summer Brie-eze
Hot Sandwiches.description: Staff favourite grilled cheese featuring our house made honey-thyme butter, caramelized onions, and brie. Comes on sourdough and served with chips and a pickle. Optional chicken upgrade.

Cold Sandwiches.name: Deli Rose
Cold Sandwiches.description: House made egg salad with smoked salmon, spinach, LTO, and dill. Comes on a croissant and served with chips and a pickle.

Cold Sandwiches.name: Yellow Submarine
Cold Sandwiches.description: Our veggie sub featuring the spread of the week, fresh sprouted greens, LTO, yellow peppers, and cucumber. Comes on our seeded sub roll and served with chips and a pickle.

Desserts.name: Cream Cheese Frosted Cinnamon Roll
Desserts.description: Fresh made cinnamon rolls ropped with our special cream cheese frosting! Served warm.

Desserts.name: Banana Bread
Desserts.description: Customer classic banana bread featuring walnuts and raisins.

Drinks.name: Dirty Chai
Drinks.description: Double shot of espresso with our house made chai, milk of your choice, and topped with cinnamon.

Drinks.name: Hibiscus Deli Cooler
Drinks.description: Iced hibiscus tea mixed with pomegranate juice, mint, and lightly sweetened with agave.
